Overcrowded with hackers in matchmaking due to free to play accounts. Who doesn't enjoy playing with or against hackers? Great game-play where you waste 40+ min of your time running around getting headshotted through walls, smokes, and doors without any repercussion to the suspects. Best fifteen bucks I spent on a game in my opinion.
